verses.verse: <S%G71>Come<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> you <S%G4145>rich,<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> and <S%G3649>howl<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5004>miseries<s%> that are coming on <S%G1904>you.<s%>
<S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> are <S%G4595>corrupted<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1096>are<s%> <S%G4598>moth-eaten.<s%>

<S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G5557>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G696>silver<s%> are <S%G2728>corroded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2447>corrosion<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> like <S%G4442>fire.<s%> You have laid up your <S%G2343>treasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G3408>wages<s%> of the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G270>mowed<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5561>fields,<s%> <S%G575>which<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> have kept back by <S%G650>fraud,<s%> <S%G2896>cry<s%> <S%G2532>out,<s%> and the <S%G2896>cries<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2325>reaped<s%> have <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3775>ears<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G4519>Armies.<s%>

You have lived <S%G5171>delicately<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> taken your <S%G5171>pleasure.<s%> You have <S%G5142>nourished<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4967>slaughter.<s%>
You have <S%G2613>condemned,<s%> you have <S%G5407>murdered<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G498>one.<s%> He <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G498>resist<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>

Be <S%G3114>patient<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G1092>farmer<s%> waits <S%G1551>for<s%> the <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> being <S%G3114>patient<s%> <S%G846>over<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2193%G99999>until<s%> it <S%G2983>receives<s%> the <S%G4406>early<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3797>late<s%> <S%G5205>rain.<s%>

<S%G5210>You<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3114>be<s%> <S%G3114>patient.<s%> <S%G4741>Establish<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand.<s%>

<S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G4727>grumble,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> one <S%G240>another,<s%> so that you <S%G3361>won't<s%> be <S%G4253>judged.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G4253>judge<s%> <S%G2476>stands<s%> <S%G3588>at<s%> the <S%G2476>door.<s%>

<S%G2983>Take,<s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> for an <S%G5262>example<s%> of <S%G2552>suffering<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3115>patience,<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> we <S%G3106>call<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> <S%G3106>blessed<s%> who <S%G5278>endured.<s%> You have <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G5281>patience<s%> of <S%G2492>Job,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> in the <S%G5056>outcome,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> how the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> full of <S%G4184>compassion<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3629>mercy.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4253>above<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G3660>swear,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> by <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> by the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> nor by <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3727>oath;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2277>let<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3483>"yes<s%>" <S%G2277>be<s%> <S%G3483>"yes,<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3756>"no,<s%>" <S%G3756>"no;<s%>" <S%G2443>so<s%> that you <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>hypocrisy.<s%>

<S%G2553>Is<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2553>suffering?<s%> Let him <S%G4336>pray.<s%> <S%G2114>Is<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2114>cheerful?<s%> Let him sing <S%G5567>praises.<s%>

<S%G770>Is<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G770>sick?<s%> Let him <S%G4341>call<s%> for the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> let them <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G218>anointing<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> with <S%G1637>oil<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2171>prayer<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> will <S%G4982>heal<s%> him who is <S%G2577>sick,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G1453>raise<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1453>up.<s%> <S%G2579>If<s%> he <S%G5600>has<s%> <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> will be <S%G863>forgiven.<s%>

<S%G1843>Confess<s%> your <S%G3900>offenses<s%> to one <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2172>pray<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> you may be <S%G2390>healed.<s%> The <S%G1754>insistent<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> of a righteous <S%G1342>person<s%> is <S%G4183>powerfully<s%> <S%G2480>effective.<s%>

<S%G2243>Elijah<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> with a <S%G3663>nature<s%> <S%G2254>like<s%> <S%G2532>ours,<s%> and he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G4335>earnestly<s%> that it <S%G1026>might<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1026>rain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1026>rain<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> for <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G1763>years<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G5205>rain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> brought <S%G985>forth<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>

<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4105>wanders<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G1994>turns<s%> him <S%G846>back,<s%>

let him <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he who <S%G1994>turns<s%> a <S%G268>sinner<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G4106>error<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> will <S%G4982>save<s%> a <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G2572>cover<s%> a <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>
